name: Push Plugin
description:
Push the model to an alternate repository. 
 Example of how to push a data-model from webgme.
The active node (i.e. open node on the canvas) will be the starting point, expect when importing a project.

configStructure.name: schematicVersion
configStructure.description: Specify the type and version of the subgraph.

configStructure.name: deliveryMode
configStructure.description: The mechanism to use to deliver the serialization.

configStructure.name: hostAddr
configStructure.displayName: Host IP address or name for delivery modes which have one.
configStructure.regexMessage: Name can only contain latin characters, digits, dot, hyphen and underscore. It may also be a four part dotted address.
configStructure.description: What is the ip address or name of the host for the graph database mega-model.
